name: Mini Car Racing - Tiny Split Screen Tournament
name_original: Mini Car Racing - Tiny Split Screen Tournament
description:
Welcome to the one and only tiny split-screen racing tournament!

Grab a friend (or none if no one is around), strap on your seat belt, and hit the road in more than 24 hot and lovely designed mini tracks.
It’s fast, it’s fun, it’s exciting.
It’s time for Mini Car Racing.

Mini Car Racing – Tiny Split Screen Tournament features

  • A single-player and local multiplayer mode with 1-4 players
  • Play together or against your friends (if you have any)
  • Experience a fun and exciting road rage
  • Feel the speed of the tiny cars while bursting over one of the 24 specifically designed tracks
  • Enjoy an intriguing and action-packed soundtrack
  • Show your friends who the boss is – YOU!

The game also features

  • 24 tracks
  • 6 different tournaments
  • 3 different difficulties
  • 8 unique cars
  • 1-4 players
